name: pouchdb-vhost
description: A PouchDB plug-in that allows you to re-use your CouchDB vhost config on the client side.
author: Marten de Vries

scripts.build-js: mkdir -p dist && browserify index.js -s VirtualHost -g es3ify -o dist/pouchdb-vhost.js
scripts.build: npm run build-js; cd dist; uglifyjs pouchdb-vhost.js -mc > pouchdb-vhost.min.js
